name: Dice Roll Game ·
description:
Ever forgot or lost a Dice ?!
We have the solution for you, this dice simulator can display up to 8 dice so you can play your favorite game.

• Tap on the screen to roll
• Tap a dice to lock it and roll all other dice
• Up to 8 dice
• Change background with a selection of pictures or your own from the library

Customize your dice to make the experience unique.
This app is a perfect fit for many board games such as Monopoly, Yatzy, Backgammon and many more.
